overview: In year 2020 money is in charge of all human action. Ultimate lifestyle and desire for money has together created the most dangerous and at the same time most popular TV-show ever. Its called Tapporalli. In the show competitors are forced to destroy each others to win the grand price, 500 billion dollars. Movie is a story about boy and girl who meet in the show. But does the Tapporalli give any mercy...
title: Tapporalli 2020
